article:
'Bubble boy', 'boy in the bubble' or 'boy in the plastic bubble' may refer to:

* Bubble boy disease, a genetic disorder which results in an extreme
  vulnerability to infectious diseases *Ted DeVita (1962â1980), a victim of
  severe aplastic anaemia who was forced to live in a sterile hospital room
  *David Vetter (1971â1984), a victim of Severe Combined Immune Deficiency
  Syndrome who was forced to live in a sterile environment *[[The Boy in the
  Plastic Bubble]], a 1976 film starring John Travolta *"The Boy in the Bubble",
  a 1986 song by Paul Simon from the album [[Graceland (album)|Graceland]] *"The
  Bubble Boy" (''Seinfeld''), a 1992 episode of the Seinfeld TV series *[[Bubble
  Boy (film)]], a 2001 film starring Jake Gyllenhaal
